seo.metaTitle: About AtreusPhysio | Founders Swatheeshwaran & Dr. Swathi
seo.metaDescription: Meet the team behind AtreusPhysio. We combine clinical expertise with a passion for education to elevate physiotherapy standards.
seo.ogDescription: Leading the way in evidence-based rehab and education.

hero.title: Bridging Evidence & Practice
hero.subtitle: AtreusPhysio is more than a clinic; it's a movement towards better physiotherapy standards.

content.intro: Founded by Swatheeshwaran and Dr. Swathi, AtreusPhysio was born from a shared vision: to provide patient-centred care that is truly evidence-based, while simultaneously empowering the next generation of therapists through high-quality education.
content.mission: To demystify complex rehabilitation concepts for patients and professionals alike.

founders.name: Swatheeshwaran
founders.bio: A passionate Sports Physiotherapist with a deep interest in tendon rehabilitation and clinical reasoning. Swatheeshwaran is a well-known educator in the physio community, frequently lecturing on complex musculoskeletal conditions.

founders.name: Dr. Swathi
founders.bio: Specializing in orthopedic rehabilitation, Dr. Swathi brings a compassionate, patient-first approach to care. She is also an Assistant Professor, dedicated to academic excellence.
